sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react";
import {
    StyleSheet,
    View,
    Text,
    TouchableOpacity,
    ScrollView
} from "react-native";
import OptionsItem from "./components/OptionsItem";
import {MaterialCommunityIcon} from ''

function AddProductModal() {
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <View style={styles.topRow}>
                <Text style={styles.productAdd}>Product Add</Text>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.templateBtn}>
                    <Text style={styles.templatesBtnLbl}>Templates</Text>
                    <IoniconsIcon
                        name="ios-arrow-down"
                        style={styles.chevronDownIcon}
                    ></IoniconsIcon>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.innerScrollArea}>
                <ScrollView
                    horizontal={false}
                    contentContainerStyle={styles.innerScrollArea_contentContainerStyle}
                >
                    <View style={styles.imageUploadGroup}>
                        <Text style={styles.productImageUploadTxt}>
                            Product Image Upload
                        </Text>
                        <View style={styles.productImageUpContainer}>
                            <View style={styles.uploadImageInner}>
                                <MaterialCommunityIconsIcon
                                    name="folder-multiple-image"
                                    style={styles.upProductImageIcon}
                                ></MaterialCommunityIconsIcon>
                                <Text style={styles.dragDropImageTxt}>
                                    Drag & drop or select a file to upload Image
                                </Text>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.spacer}></View>
                    <View style={styles.productSmallDetailsRow}>
                        <View style={styles.productNameInputGroup}>
                            <Text style={styles.productNameTxt}>Product Name</Text>
                            <View style={styles.productNameBox}></View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.productPriceInputGroup}>
                            <Text style={styles.productPriceTxt}>Product Price</Text>
                            <View style={styles.productPriceBox}></View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.productCategoryInputGroup}>
                            <Text style={styles.category}>Category</Text>
                            <View style={styles.categoryDropDownBox}></View>
                        </View>
                        <View style={styles.productRankInputGroup}>
                            <Text style={styles.rankTxt}>Rank</Text>
                            <View style={styles.rankBox}></View>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.spacer2}></View>
                    <View style={styles.displayOnlineSwitchRow}>
                        <Text style={styles.displayOnlineStoreTxt}>
                            Display on online store?:
                        </Text>
                        <View style={styles.onlineStoreSwitch}></View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.spacer3}></View>
                    <View style={styles.productDescriptionInputGroup}>
                        <Text style={styles.productDescriptionTxt}>
                            Product Description
                        </Text>
                        <View style={styles.productDiscBox}></View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={styles.spacer4}></View>
                    <Text style={styles.optionsTxt}>Options</Text>
                    <View style={styles.spacer5}></View>
                    <OptionsItem style={styles.optionsItem}></OptionsItem>
                    <TouchableOpacity style={styles.createOptionBtn}>
                        <Text style={styles.createOptionTxt}>Create Option</Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </ScrollView>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.cancelAndSaveBtns}>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.cancelBtn}>
                    <Text style={styles.cancelTxt}>Cancel</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.saveBtn}>
                    <Text style={styles.saveTxt}>Save</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
        </View>
    );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        backgroundColor: "#ffffff",
        borderRadius: 10,
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: "#e6e6e6",
        shadowColor: "#efefef",
        shadowOffset: {
            width: 3,
            height: 3
        },
        elevation: 30,
        shadowOpacity: 1,
        shadowRadius: 10,
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "space-around",
        width: 1135,
        height: 852
    },
    topRow: {
        width: 1071,
        height: 49,
        flexDirection: "row",
        justifyContent: "space-between"
    },
    productAdd: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-700",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 21
    },
    templateBtn: {
        width: 175,
        height: 48,
        backgroundColor: "#1c294e",
        borderRadius: 20,
        flexDirection: "row",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "center"
    },
    templatesBtnLbl: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-700",
        color: "rgba(255,255,255,1)",
        fontSize: 20,
        marginRight: 10
    },
    chevronDownIcon: {
        color: "rgba(255,255,255,1)",
        fontSize: 20
    },
    innerScrollArea: {
        width: 904,
        height: 652
    },
    innerScrollArea_contentContainerStyle: {
        height: 1177,
        width: 904
    },
    imageUploadGroup: {
        width: 902,
        height: 179,
        justifyContent: "space-between"
    },
    productImageUploadTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-regular",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 17,
        marginBottom: 0
    },
    productImageUpContainer: {
        width: 902,
        height: 150,
        backgroundColor: "#ffffff",
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: "#a8a8a8",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "flex-start",
        marginBottom: 0
    },
    uploadImageInner: {
        width: 306,
        height: 98,
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        marginTop: 13
    },
    upProductImageIcon: {
        color: "rgba(0,0,0,1)",
        fontSize: 70
    },
    dragDropImageTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-regular",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 16
    },
    spacer: {
        width: 902,
        height: 53
    },
    productSmallDetailsRow: {
        width: 902,
        height: 79,
        flexDirection: "row",
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        alignItems: "center"
    },
    productNameInputGroup: {
        width: 195,
        height: 79,
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        marginTop: 0
    },
    productNameTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-500",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 17
    },
    productNameBox: {
        width: 195,
        height: 52,
        backgroundColor: "rgba(255,255, 255,1)",
        borderRadius: 5,
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: "#9e9e9e"
    },
    productPriceInputGroup: {
        width: 197,
        height: 79,
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        marginTop: 0
    },
    productPriceTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-500",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 17
    },
    productPriceBox: {
        width: 197,
        height: 52,
        backgroundColor: "rgba(255,255, 255,1)",
        borderRadius: 5,
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: "#9e9e9e"
    },
    productCategoryInputGroup: {
        width: 195,
        height: 79,
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        marginTop: 0
    },
    category: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-500",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 17
    },
    categoryDropDownBox: {
        width: 195,
        height: 52,
        backgroundColor: "rgba(255,255, 255,1)",
        borderRadius: 5,
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: "#9e9e9e"
    },
    productRankInputGroup: {
        width: 156,
        height: 79,
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        marginTop: 0
    },
    rankTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-500",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 17
    },
    rankBox: {
        width: 154,
        height: 52,
        backgroundColor: "rgba(255,255, 255,1)",
        borderRadius: 5,
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: "#9e9e9e"
    },
    spacer2: {
        width: 902,
        height: 36
    },
    displayOnlineSwitchRow: {
        width: 247,
        height: 20,
        flexDirection: "row",
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        alignItems: "center"
    },
    displayOnlineStoreTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-500",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 17
    },
    onlineStoreSwitch: {
        width: 40,
        height: 20,
        backgroundColor: "#E6E6E6"
    },
    spacer3: {
        width: 902,
        height: 28
    },
    productDescriptionInputGroup: {
        width: 902,
        height: 141,
        justifyContent: "space-between"
    },
    productDescriptionTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-500",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 17
    },
    productDiscBox: {
        width: 902,
        height: 114,
        backgroundColor: "#ffffff",
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: "#a8a8a8"
    },
    spacer4: {
        width: 902,
        height: 31
    },
    optionsTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-700",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 16
    },
    spacer5: {
        width: 902,
        height: 31
    },
    optionsItem: {
        height: 502,
        alignSelf: "stretch"
    },
    createOptionBtn: {
        width: 173,
        height: 47,
        backgroundColor: "#1c294e",
        borderRadius: 20,
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "center"
    },
    createOptionTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-700",
        color: "rgba(255,255,255,1)",
        fontSize: 20
    },
    cancelAndSaveBtns: {
        width: 1071,
        height: 47,
        flexDirection: "row",
        justifyContent: "flex-end",
        alignItems: "center"
    },
    cancelBtn: {
        width: 173,
        height: 47,
        backgroundColor: "#eef2ff",
        borderRadius: 20,
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "center",
        marginRight: 25
    },
    cancelTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-700",
        color: "#121212",
        fontSize: 20
    },
    saveBtn: {
        width: 173,
        height: 47,
        backgroundColor: "#1c294e",
        borderRadius: 20
    },
    saveTxt: {
        fontFamily: "roboto-700",
        color: "#eef2ff",
        fontSize: 20,
        marginTop: 11,
        marginLeft: 65
    }
});

export default AddProductModal;
